detectors.description:
ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/POLKACoinFinance.sol#92-100) can write the state variable array at will

	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/POLKACoinFinance.sol#98)
